name: mdlab-direct-monorepo
description: MDLAB Direct - Laboratory Management System (Backend + Web + Mobile)

scripts.install-all: cd backend & npm install & cd ../frontend & npm install & cd ../mobile & npm install
scripts.dev: start cmd /k "cd backend && npm start" & start cmd /k "cd frontend && npm run dev" & start cmd /k "cd mobile && npm start"
scripts.dev:backend-web: start cmd /k "cd backend && npm start" & start cmd /k "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:backend-mobile: start cmd /k "cd backend && npm start" & start cmd /k "cd mobile && npm start"

author: MDLAB Direct Team
